text:
@funder What Republicans find it hard to grasp is that, beside Democrats being unemployed due to the coronavirus pandemic, there are ALSO Republicans that are out of work.
For some reason, THAT bit of information seems to be difficult for them to realize. Their attitude will bite THEM.
